questions.text: Match the following CIDR notations with their respective subnet masks and the number of usable host addresses in each subnet.
Consider the following two statements about SMTP: (A) SMTP uses persistent connections over TCP. (B) SMTP requires the messages to be in 7-bit ASCII format. Which of the above statements is/are TRUE?
In OSPF, what is the purpose of flooding link state advertisements (LSAs)?
options: B) To propagate link state information throughout the network
D) To filter routing updates based on authentication
